definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, historically derived from the given name 'Piers' or 'Peter', often used to identify individuals or families bearing this name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自英语的姓氏，历史上由名字 'Piers' 或 'Peter' 演变而来，常用于标识拥有此姓氏的个人或家族。
definitions.example_en: Dr. Pearce presented her research on climate change at the international conference.
definitions.example_cn: 皮尔斯博士在国际会议上展示了她关于气候变化的研究。
